T02TD2172E:328a-0: @328a # // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2172E:328a-1: lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag 'di //
T02TD2172E:328a-2: rgyud rnams kun las mi gsal pa'i //
T02TD2172E:328a-3: mkha' 'gro ma yis rgyas btab la //
T02TD2172E:328a-4: rnal 'byor blo dman don du ni //
T02TD2172E:328a-5: yang nas yang du gsol btab nas //
T02TD2172E:328a-6: yid ches brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD2172E:328a-7: man ngag rim pa bstan pa la ;
T02TD2172E:328a-8: / bla ma las ni mnyan par gyis //
T02TD2172E:328a-9: gsang sngags sgo ni dpag med nas //
T02TD2172E:328a-10: thabs kyi rim pa mang gsungs pa //
T02TD2172E:328a-11: sems can las ni sna tshogs pas //
T02TD2172E:328a-12: so so mos pa mi mthun phyir //
T02TD2172E:328a-13: dper na sman rnams nus pa yis //
T02TD2172E:328a-14: nad rnams so sor sel ba bzhin //
T02TD2172E:328a-15: man ngag thabs rnams so sos kyang //
T02TD2172E:328a-16: dug gi nad rnams 'joms par byed //
T02TD2172E:328a-17: dper na sman nus gcig gis kyang //
T02TD2172E:328a-18: phrad pa tsam gyis nad 'joms pa'o //
T02TD2172E:328b-0: de dag @328b kun gyis ma choms pa //
T02TD2172E:328b-1: sbyor ba gzhan log 'doms pa dang //
T02TD2172E:328b-2: gnyan pa kho nas 'joms pa dang //
T02TD2172E:328b-3: sman dang sbyor ba de dag kyang //
T02TD2172E:328b-5: mi mkhas pas ni gnod par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:328b-6: sman pa mkhas par gyur kyang ni //
T02TD2172E:328b-7: brtson 'grus nan tan ma byas na ;
T02TD2172E:328b-9: de bzhin mthun pa'i dpe rnams kyang //
T02TD2172E:328b-10: mkha' 'gro ma yis lung bstan na //
T02TD2172E:328b-12: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis nyon mongs 'joms //
T02TD2172E:328b-13: bsgoms pa las byung dngos grub kyis //
T02TD2172E:328b-14: mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:328b-15: ting 'dzin thob par ma gyur pas //
T02TD2172E:328b-16: tshogs 'khor tshogs mchod dngos grub po //
T02TD2172E:328b-17: de ma byung na sbyin sreg gis //
T02TD2172E:328b-18: dngos grub sgrub par gsungs pa yin //
T02TD2172E:328b-19: de ma byung ba bzlas brjod do //
T02TD2172E:328b-20: de ni ma byung gtor ma bya //
T02TD2172E:328b-21: de rnams kun las ma byung na //
T02TD2172E:328b-22: las ni phran tshegs gzhan yang bstan //
T02TD2172E:328b-23: yang na de dag thams cad kyang //
T02TD2172E:328b-27: yang na mchog 'dod pa la ni //
T02TD2172E:328b-28: thams cad rdzogs par dgos par gsungs //
T02TD2172E:328b-29: thun mong dngos grub sgrub pa la //
T02TD2172E:328b-30: che chung gis na rim pas gsungs //
T02TD2172E:328b-32: gsang sngags la la'i bzhed kyis ni //
T02TD2172E:328b-33: dper na sprul ni gshu bur zhugs //
T02TD2172E:328b-35: de bzhin rnal 'byor sngags pa yang //
T02TD2172E:328b-36: rig 'dzin sa dang rdo rje dmyal //
T02TD2172E:328b-37: la la dag gi gzhung gis ni //
T02TD2172E:328b-39: la la skye ba phyi ma la //
T02TD2172E:328b-40: la la dag gis bzhed kyis ni //
T02TD2172E:328b-41: gnyis dang gsum pa dag la'o //
T02TD2172E:328b-42: bzhi pa'am lnga par 'dod pa'ang yod //
T02TD2172E:328b-43: la la skye ba bdun pa la //
T02TD2172E:328b-44: phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'dod //
T02TD2172E:328b-45: de ltar gzhung lugs mi 'dra ba ;
T02TD2172E:328b-46: / mang du gsungs pa de dag kyang //
T02TD2172E:328b-47: 'gal ba med de kun kyang bden //
T02TD2172E:328b-48: gsang sngags kyi ni gzhung gis kyang //
T02TD2172E:328b-49: skye ba bdun las mi dma' bas //
T02TD2172E:328b-50: skye ba bdun gyi tha ma la //
T02TD2172E:328b-51: ma bsgoms kyang ni sangs rgyas sa //
T02TD2172E:328b-52: zhes su rgyud las bstan pa yin //
T02TD2172E:329a-2: / sngags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin //
T02TD2172E:329a-3: sngags dang sman la sogs pa yi //
T02TD2172E:329a-4: stobs kyis lus sems las rung bas //
T02TD2172E:329a-5: sha dang thod pa la sogs pa //
T02TD2172E:329a-6: bsten cing zos pas dngos grub thob //
T02TD2172E:329a-7: de bas sngags mthu'i yon tan no //
T02TD2172E:329a-8: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD2172E:329a-9: skye ba bdun pa 'ong srid kyang //
T02TD2172E:329a-10: de ltar 'ong ba shin tu dkon //
T02TD2172E:329a-11: skye ba bdun pa zhes bya'i gnas //
T02TD2172E:329a-12: phal cher dur khrod chen po yi //
T02TD2172E:329a-13: mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas su skye //
T02TD2172E:329a-14: rig 'dzin sa zhes bya ba yang //
T02TD2172E:329a-15: gcig ni de la'ang bya ba yin //
T02TD2172E:329a-16: rig 'dzin sa la'ang gsum yod de //
T02TD2172E:329a-17: dur khrod rin chen sa dang ni //
T02TD2172E:329a-18: bar snang lha gnas lha rtan sa //
T02TD2172E:329a-19: mkha' spyod 'og min stug po'i sa //
T02TD2172E:329a-20: gnas ni de gsum yin par gsungs //
T02TD2172E:329a-21: skye ba bdun pa'i gang zag ni /
T02TD2172E:329a-22: lus dang gnas ni khyad par can //
T02TD2172E:329a-23: sngags spyod pa yi yul dag tu //
T02TD2172E:329a-24: 'ga' tsam byung ba dag kyang yod //
T02TD2172E:329a-25: skye ba gcig sogs gzhan pa ni //
T02TD2172E:329a-26: de rnams gnas kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2172E:329a-27: skye ba bdun pa'i gang zag ni //
T02TD2172E:329a-28: dad dang snying rje la sogs ldan //
T02TD2172E:329a-29: pha rol phyin bcu'i chos la sbyod //
T02TD2172E:329a-30: mthun 'jug spyod pa kun la mkhas //
T02TD2172E:329a-31: bzo dang rig pa gnas la mkhas //
T02TD2172E:329a-32: lta ba ma nor gdeng du gyur //
T02TD2172E:329a-33: spyod pa la dor thabs la mkhas //
T02TD2172E:329a-34: man ngag mthong ba tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2172E:329a-35: the tshom med par 'jug par byed / man ngag bsgoms ma thag tu ni //
T02TD2172E:329a-37: khams dang dus kyi bye brag shes //
T02TD2172E:329a-38: rgyud lus mtshan gyi man ngag la //
T02TD2172E:329a-39: thos pa tsam gyis dbu zhabs kyi //
T02TD2172E:329a-40: man ngag rnams ni khong du chud //
T02TD2172E:329a-41: bshad pa'i rgyud dang 'grel pa dang //
T02TD2172E:329a-42: mngon rtogs pa yi rim pa rnams //
T02TD2172E:329a-43: ma thos ba ru shes par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:329a-44: dper na shing 'dzer stsal pa cam //
T02TD2172E:329a-45: rgyud lus man ngag mdo mdo yi //
T02TD2172E:329a-46: mkhas pa la ni brten pa su ;
T02TD2172E:329a-47: / thams cad don rnams khong chud nas //
T02TD2172E:329a-48: skabs phyed spyi don shin tu rgyas //
T02TD2172E:329a-49: dka' 'grel mngon rtogs rim pa ni //
T02TD2172E:329a-50: rtsom nus don la shin tu mkhas //
T02TD2172E:329a-51: mig ni yun ring mi 'dzum zhing //
T02TD2172E:329a-52: yi dam lha bsgom dus su ni //
T02TD2172E:329a-53: skye ba bdun pa'i grib ma snang //
T02TD2172E:329b-0: skye ba @329b gnyis sogs gzhan po la //
T02TD2172E:329b-1: grib ma'i rtags kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2172E:329b-2: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyi khyad par gyis //
T02TD2172E:329b-3: zhag bdun zla gcig zla bdun du //
T02TD2172E:329b-4: mkha' 'gro mas ni lung ston zhing //
T02TD2172E:329b-5: chos bshad rtags rnams ston par mdzad //
T02TD2172E:329b-6: chos pa yi ni mdzad spyod kyang //
T02TD2172E:329b-7: dngos su sprul nas ston pa dang //
T02TD2172E:329b-8: yang sbrul sum sprul la sogs su //
T02TD2172E:329b-9: sprul nas ston dang yang na ni //
T02TD2172E:329b-10: sku ni mi snang sgra yis su //
T02TD2172E:329b-11: nam mkha' las su ston pa dang //
T02TD2172E:329b-12: yang na phyag mtshan la sogs la //
T02TD2172E:329b-13: sgra byung nas ni ston pa dang //
T02TD2172E:329b-14: yang na rmi lam mtshan mas su //
T02TD2172E:329b-15: dus bzhi dus gsum dus gcig tu //
T02TD2172E:329b-16: yang nas yang du ston pa'o //
T02TD2172E:329b-17: ma thos pa yi man ngag rnams //
T02TD2172E:329b-18: ston mor byed na skye bdun sogs //
T02TD2172E:329b-19: sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi //
T02TD2172E:329b-21: yang na dang po skyes nas ni //
T02TD2172E:329b-22: theg chen chos la mos nas kyang //
T02TD2172E:329b-23: man ngag bsgoms la shin tu dga' //
T02TD2172E:329b-24: slob dpon la ni man ngag gi //
T02TD2172E:329b-25: rna brgyud gcig tsam thos pas su //
T02TD2172E:329b-26: bsgoms pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:329b-27: de nas gong bzhin byung nas su //
T02TD2172E:329b-28: gzhan la yang ni ston par nus //
T02TD2172E:329b-29: yang na skye bdun gang zag ste //
T02TD2172E:329b-30: skyes ma thag tu yi dam lhas ;
T02TD2172E:329b-31: / rmi lam na ni chos bstan nas //
T02TD2172E:329b-32: man ngag de bsgoms dngos grub ni //
T02TD2172E:329b-33: phra mo dag ni thob nas kyang //
T02TD2172E:329b-34: gzhan la chos ni ston par nus //
T02TD2172E:329b-35: de nas rim gyis gzhan yang 'byung //
T02TD2172E:329b-36: yang na skye bdun gang zag de //
T02TD2172E:329b-37: rkyen ni gnyis po 'dzom pa las //
T02TD2172E:329b-38: bsgom pa la ni dga' bar 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:329b-39: son gyi bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni //
T02TD2172E:329b-40: 'bad rtsol drag po ma byas par //
T02TD2172E:329b-41: thun gcig la ni sgom pa rnyed //
T02TD2172E:329b-42: de nas rim gyis bsgoms pas su //
T02TD2172E:329b-43: zhag bdun nas ni lung ston 'byung //
T02TD2172E:329b-44: de nas rim gsum gong ma bzhin //
T02TD2172E:329b-45: de nas mngon shes drug ldan nas //
T02TD2172E:329b-46: phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:329b-47: sngags pa'i dngos grub thams cad kun //
T02TD2172E:329b-48: skye bas 'di la phyag rgya thob //
T02TD2172E:329b-49: de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2172E:329b-50: gong ma bzhin du kye bdun du //
T02TD2172E:329b-51: len pa'i rtags ni gong bzhin 'byung //
T02TD2172E:329b-52: skye ba 'di thob tshul rnams kyang //
T02TD2172E:329b-53: theg chen snod du rung ba la //
T02TD2172E:330a-2: dam tshig ma nyams bshags la brtson //
T02TD2172E:330a-3: bskyed rim brtan par gyur pas ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-4: lus kyi rnam rtog bzlog nas kyang //
T02TD2172E:330a-5: rdo rje bzlas la brten nas kyang //
T02TD2172E:330a-6: ngag gi rnam rtog bzlog nas ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-7: sems dben pa la brten par bya //
T02TD2172E:330a-8: sems kyi 'khrul rtog bzlog nas kyang //
T02TD2172E:330a-9: sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
T02TD2172E:330a-11: de nas spros med man ngag la //
T02TD2172E:330a-12: lhun gyis grub 'gyur phyag rgya'i mchog / yang na bskyed rim la brten nas //
T02TD2172E:330a-13: tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin sgrub //
T02TD2172E:330a-14: tshe la dbang sgrub rig 'dzin gyi //
T02TD2172E:330a-15: rdzogs pa'i man ngag bsgom par bya //
T02TD2172E:330a-16: des su phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob //
T02TD2172E:330a-17: yang na bskyed rim brtan pa yis //
T02TD2172E:330a-18: rdzogs pa'i man ngag gang bsgoms kyang //
T02TD2172E:330a-19: zla ba drug gis phyag rgya 'thob //
T02TD2172E:330a-20: rdzogs rim bskyed pa la brten nas //
T02TD2172E:330a-21: de nas rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pas ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-22: phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par gsungs //
T02TD2172E:330a-23: de ni slob dpon chen po'i gzhung //
T02TD2172E:330a-24: sbyor na lta ba gdeng 'gyur gtso //
T02TD2172E:330a-25: lhan cig ldog bya'i tshul du ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-26: byas nas the tshom mi skye zhing //
T02TD2172E:330a-29: de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2172E:330a-30: man ngag nyams su lon par bya //
T02TD2172E:330a-31: man ngag bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-32: mkha' 'gro ma yis lung ston pas //
T02TD2172E:330a-33: lung bstan pa yi dus su ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-34: lta ba man ngag zab mo ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-35: bstan pa bsgoms pas phyag rgya 'thob //
T02TD2172E:330a-36: mang na rnal 'byor rim pas ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-37: blo yi rab 'bring khyad par ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-38: bag chags rkyen la sogs pa yis //
T02TD2172E:330a-39: rab 'bring dgu dang gsum dang ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-40: dbye bar bya ba'i don shes bya //
T02TD2172E:330a-41: rgyu rkyen 'dzom pa'i gang zag ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-42: skye ba 'di la lung ston pas //
T02TD2172E:330a-43: phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:330a-44: rkyen ni rab tu mang gyur pa'i //
T02TD2172E:330a-45: rab kyi 'bring sogs ldan pa can //
T02TD2172E:330a-46: bar ma do la lung bstan no //
T02TD2172E:330a-47: rab kyi tha ma ldan pa ni //
T02TD2172E:330a-48: skye ba phyi ma lung ston no //
T02TD2172E:330a-49: 'bring gi gsum po'i rigs ldan yang //
T02TD2172E:330a-50: gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi ru sbyar //
T02TD2172E:330a-51: tha ma'i rigs ldan gsum po yang //
T02TD2172E:330a-52: lnga dang drug dang bdun du sbyar //
T02TD2172E:330a-53: yang na rkyen sogs ldan gyur kyang //
T02TD2172E:330b-0: rgyu la sogs @330b pa'i nus pa rnams //
T02TD2172E:330b-1: drag zhan gyi ni rim pa yis //
T02TD2172E:330b-2: rkyen kyi tshul bzhin sbyor shes bya'o //
T02TD2172E:330b-3: rgyu rkyen gnyi ga 'bring sogs kyi //
T02TD2172E:330b-4: rim pa dang ni ldan pa rnams //
T02TD2172E:330b-5: gong ma gnyis dang mi mthun pas //
T02TD2172E:330b-6: gsum dang bdun du sbyar shes bya //
T02TD2172E:330b-7: gnyis ka zhan par gyur pa na //
T02TD2172E:330b-8: gsang sngags snod du mi rung bas //
T02TD2172E:330b-9: dbang bskur mi bya 'jug pa tsam //
T02TD2172E:330b-10: dge ba'i sa bon chung gyur kyang //
T02TD2172E:330b-11: smon lam btab pa'i ngang ldan de //
T02TD2172E:330b-12: gsang sngags la ni mos gyur nas //
T02TD2172E:330b-13: yang nas yang du gsol 'debs la //
T02TD2172E:330b-14: phyi ma'i dbang bskur tsam byas la //
T02TD2172E:330b-15: mi zab dbyibs kyi man ngag bstan //
T02TD2172E:330b-16: de las bstan pa'i gang zag la //
T02TD2172E:330b-17: lhag ma rnams ni rim gyis bstan //
T02TD2172E:330b-18: yang na rnal 'byor rim pa ni //
T02TD2172E:330b-19: yid dam lha tshogs so so ru //
T02TD2172E:330b-20: so so bag chags gzhag pa dang //
T02TD2172E:330b-21: mos pa la sogs rim pa yis //
T02TD2172E:330b-22: the tshom la sogs med mod kyang //
T02TD2172E:330b-23: dngos grub 'gyub par ma gyur na ;
T02TD2172E:330b-24: / sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du shes kyi //
T02TD2172E:330b-25: tha mi dad par bsgoms nas kyang //
T02TD2172E:330b-26: man ngag yang yang spros kyang ni //
T02TD2172E:330b-28: de ltar byas kyang ma byung na //
T02TD2172E:330b-29: sgrib pa shin tu che gsungs pas //
T02TD2172E:330b-30: sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor bzlas brjod dang //
T02TD2172E:330b-31: gtor ma la sogs cho ga yis //
T02TD2172E:330b-32: bdun nas stong gi bar du ni //
T02TD2172E:330b-33: mkhas pas ci nus rgyud brtags la //
T02TD2172E:330b-34: sna tshogs sdig pa sbyang ba gsung //
T02TD2172E:330b-35: lus kun la ni gnod pa yi //
T02TD2172E:330b-36: tsher ma'i phung pos lam rnams 'gags //
T02TD2172E:330b-37: me yi sbyor ba mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2172E:330b-38: bsregs pas thams cad med par byed //
T02TD2172E:330b-39: de nas lam ni rnyed nas ni //
T02TD2172E:330b-40: gang du phyin par 'gro bar byed //
T02TD2172E:330b-41: de bzhin sngags sogs mthun rnams kyis //
T02TD2172E:330b-42: sgrib pa la sogs bcom nas kyang //
T02TD2172E:330b-43: ting nge 'dzin gyi lam rnyed nas //
T02TD2172E:330b-44: dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:330b-45: dngos grub khyad par ma thob kyang //
T02TD2172E:330b-46: phra mo dla sogs thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:330b-47: mtshan ma'i lung ston phra mo 'byung //
T02TD2172E:330b-48: gal te de ltar ma gyur par //
T02TD2172E:330b-49: tshe dbang ma thob rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2172E:330b-50: sgrib pa rnams ni byang gyur nas //
T02TD2172E:330b-51: skye ba phyi ma la sogs su //
T02TD2172E:330b-52: dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:330b-53: yang na sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis //
T02TD2172E:331a-2: che long rags pa mgo bcom nas //
T02TD2172E:331a-3: gzhan dag mi skye mgo gnon zhing //
T02TD2172E:331a-4: dam tshig ma nyams bshags la brtson //
T02TD2172E:331a-5: smon lam dge rtsa bsngo legs pas //
T02TD2172E:331a-6: skye ba 'di rjes gzhan dag tu //
T02TD2172E:331a-7: dus dang gnas dang slob dpon dang //
T02TD2172E:331a-8: grogs dang phyag rgya man ngag sogs //
T02TD2172E:331a-9: skyes ma thag tu rnyed par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:331a-10: de ru dam tshig ldan sogs pas //
T02TD2172E:331a-11: rim gyis skye bdun brgyud nas su //
T02TD2172E:331a-12: 'bad rtsol drag bo ma byas par //
T02TD2172E:331a-13: sangs rgyas sa la 'gro bar gsungs //
T02TD2172E:331a-14: de sogs lung bstan sbyor ba rnams //
T02TD2172E:331a-15: mkha' 'gro ma yi lung ston du ;
T02TD2172E:331a-16: / rnal 'byor mkhas pas shes par bya //
T02TD2172E:331a-17: 'di ni blo dman don ched du //
T02TD2172E:331a-18: cung zad bsdus te bstan pa yin //
T02TD2172E:331a-19: mkha' 'gro ma yis lung ston kyang //
T02TD2172E:331a-25: mdzes pa'i gzugs dang mi mdzes pa'i //
T02TD2172E:331a-26: gzugs ni sna tshogs sprul nas ston //
T02TD2172E:331a-28: re dang dogs pa'i sems spangs te //
T02TD2172E:331a-29: phyag rgya brda la sogs pa yis //
T02TD2172E:331a-30: ston pa'i dus su las rnams ni //
T02TD2172E:331a-31: ston par shes par ma gyur na //
T02TD2172E:331a-32: dngos grub med de nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:331a-33: de bas nan tan cher bskyed la //
T02TD2172E:331a-34: man ngag thos pa che ba gces //
T02TD2172E:331a-35: thos pa che bar ma gyur yang //
T02TD2172E:331a-36: gang sgrub rgyud skor la sogs la //
T02TD2172E:331a-37: slob dpon la ni yang nas yang //
T02TD2172E:331a-38: the tshom chod par mnyan par bya //
T02TD2172E:331a-39: rgyud rnams thos par mi nus pas //
T02TD2172E:331a-40: sgrub pa'i cha rkyen bcu bdun po //
T02TD2172E:331a-41: shes par de ni ma byas na //
T02TD2172E:331a-43: slob dpon la ni brten pa yis //
T02TD2172E:331a-44: ma tshang yang ni 'grub par gsungs //
T02TD2172E:331a-45: 'jig rten pa la gnyis yod do //
T02TD2172E:331a-46: rgyal bas bka' la btags pa yis //
T02TD2172E:331a-47: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang //
T02TD2172E:331a-48: bdud ni nag po la sogs pa //
T02TD2172E:331a-49: dam la ma thogs bar chod mkhan //
T02TD2172E:331a-50: de ltar gnyis su ma shes na //
T02TD2172E:331a-51: dngos grub thob kyang slar la 'tshor //
T02TD2172E:331a-52: de gnyis gzugs dang rtags sogs pa //
T02TD2172E:331b-0: gong ma @331b bzhin du ston pas na //
T02TD2172E:331b-1: de yi rim pa gong bzhin bya //
T02TD2172E:331b-2: de dag brtags pa'i cho ga yang //
T02TD2172E:331b-3: zhag gsum zhag bdun rtsa gcig tu //
T02TD2172E:331b-4: re dogs la sogs thams cad kun //
T02TD2172E:331b-6: nan tan du ni brtson 'grus bya //
T02TD2172E:331b-7: tshogs 'khor la sogs yang dang yang byed pa'i dus su rdo rje glu //
T02TD2172E:331b-8: len cing phyag rgya sogs bstan pas //
T02TD2172E:331b-9: ting 'dzin phyag rgya gsal ba dang //
T02TD2172E:331b-10: mtshan ma la sogs gsal 'bar zhing //
T02TD2172E:331b-11: gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs //
T02TD2172E:331b-12: thams cad brtan zhing mi 'gyur na //
T02TD2172E:331b-13: lha yi mtshan mar shes par bya //
T02TD2172E:331b-14: de las bzlog pa thams cad kun //
T02TD2172E:331b-15: bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya //
T02TD2172E:331b-16: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / mkha' 'gro'i lung du bstan pas na //
T02TD2172E:331b-17: 'dir ni sgrub po'i don du bsdus //
T02TD2172E:331b-18: sgrub pa'i cha rkyen man ngag rnams //
T02TD2172E:331b-19: sgrub po nyams su len pa la //
T02TD2172E:331b-20: bstan zhing spel na bsod nams 'phel ;
T02TD2172E:331b-21: / nyams su mi len ser sna can //
T02TD2172E:331b-22: rdzas dang lus srog la sogs pa //
T02TD2172E:331b-23: bla ma la ni 'bul mi nus //
T02TD2172E:331b-24: de la man ngag bstan mi bya //
T02TD2172E:331b-25: de la man ngag bstan pa na //
T02TD2172E:331b-26: dngos grub nyams te sdig pa 'phel //
T02TD2172E:331b-27: dam tshig nyams nas mkha' 'gros gsod //
T02TD2172E:331b-28: cha rkyen la sogs bcu bdun po //
T02TD2172E:331b-29: ston pa phyag na rdo rje yis //
T02TD2172E:331b-30: sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la //
T02TD2172E:331b-31: rna ba brgyud pa'i gdams ngag de //
T02TD2172E:331b-32: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la bstan //
T02TD2172E:331b-33: des ni ro langs ma la bstan //
T02TD2172E:331b-34: gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02TD2172E:331b-35: slob dpon phyag na rdo rje yis //
T02TD2172E:331b-36: brgyud pa'i gdams ngag rim pa rnams ;
T02TD2172E:331b-37: / nan tan gyis ni btsal bar bya //
T02TD2172E:331b-38: de la btsal ba ma shes na //
T02TD2172E:331b-39: dper na yid bzhin nor bu ni //
T02TD2172E:331b-40: klu rgyal gtsug nas rnyed nas ni //
T02TD2172E:331b-41: 'dam rdzab nang du stor ba bzhin //
T02TD2172E:331b-42: de bzhin man ngag rin chen 'di //
T02TD2172E:331b-43: lus ngag yid gsum dka' ba yi //
T02TD2172E:331b-44: sgo nas slob dpon la btsal nas ;
T02TD2172E:331b-45: / dam med rmongs pa'i lag shor na //
T02TD2172E:331b-46: dngos grub mi thob nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD2172E:331b-47: de bas nan tan bskyed de btsal //
T02TD2172E:331b-48: lung bstan pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ka'o //
T02TD2172E:331b-49: slob dpon chen po bha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2172E:331b-51: // / lo ts'a ba tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa /
